price: Kwani hakika hao ni adui zangu, isipo kuwa Mola Mlezi wa walimwengu wote.
arabic: فَإِنَّهُمۡ عَدُوّٞ لِّيٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: Kwani hakika hao mnao waabudu badala ya Mwenyezi Mungu ni maaadui kwangu mimi na kwenu. Basi mimi siwaabudu hao. Lakini ninaye muabudu na najijongeza kwake ni Muumba wa walimwengu wote, na Mwenye kumiliki mambo yao, na Mwenye kuwalinda.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-innahum ʿaduwwun lī illā rabba al-ʿālamīna
